headline: Where Intercity Renters Are Headed
abstract: A new study finds that people on the move are attracted to Denver — especially if they live in Washington, D.C. Here’s a look at some other popular migration patterns.
lead_paragraph: Americans have long migrated from city to city in search of a better life, changing the face of regional real estate markets as they go. Now, internet searches for out-of-town rentals can predict these changes before they occur.
